= Introduction =

You need to install jre1.6 for this to work correctly. This is available free of cost, just Google it.

Once you have installed JRE, you can run this application simply by double-clicking on fvb.jar

_* NOTE: *_ This will not work if you have Nokia PC Suite installed in your system, in that case try to select open with from the popup-menu and select Java Runtime.

Once you can successfully run the application and see the main screen, their are a couple of steps which needs to be followed for the Bot to work correctly.

Please refer to further documentation on this website
